anya-e0102n3:2_0: 510.Āyatanānīti dvādasāyatanāni – cakkhāyatanaṁ, rūpāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ, saddāyatanaṁ, ghānāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ, dhammāyatananti. Tattha –
anya-e0102n3:3_0: Attha lakkhaṇa tāvatva, kama saṅkhepa vitthārā;
anya-e0102n3:5_1: rūpaṁ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Rūpayatīti rūpaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:5_2: vaṇṇavikāraṁ āpajjamānaṁ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṁ pakāsetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṁ. Sappatīti saddo, udāhariyatīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṁ. Gandhayatīti gandho.
anya-e0102n3:5_3: Attano vatthuṁ sūcayatīti attho. Jīvitaṁ avhayatīti jivhā. Rasanti taṁ sattāti raso, assādentīti attho.
anya-e0102n3:5_4: Kucchitānaṁ sāsavadhammānaṁ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Phusiyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṁ. Munātīti mano.
anya-e0102n3:6_2: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṁtaṁdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti, vāyamantīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n3:6_3: Te ca āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti, vitthārentīti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n3:6_4: idañca anamatagge saṁsāre pavattaṁ atīva āyataṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayanteva, pavattayantīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n3:6_5: Iti sabbepime dhammā āyatanato, āyānaṁ tananato,
anya-e0102n3:6_6: āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṁ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n3:7_1: Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:7_2: Tathā hi loke ‘‘issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana’’ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ āyatananti vuccati.
anya-e0102n3:7_4: Sāsane pana ‘‘manoramme āyatane sevanti naṁ vihaṅgamā’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 5.38) samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:7_6: ‘‘Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 3.102) kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:8_0: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:8_1: Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo nesaṁ ākaro.
anya-e0102n3:8_5: tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ kāraṇaṁ, tesaṁ abhāve abhāvatoti. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, ākaraṭṭhena, samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, sañjātidesaṭṭhena,
anya-e0102n3:8_6: kāraṇaṭṭhenacāti imehipi kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatanaṁ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n3:9_0: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṁ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṁ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:10_1: Tāni ca pana tesaṁ lakkhaṇāni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:11_1: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva,
anya-e0102n3:11_2: evaṁ sati dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanānīti vuttānīti ce.
anya-e0102n3:11_3: Chaviññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato idha channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayametesaṁ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni,
anya-e0102n3:11_4: cakkhuviññāṇavīthipariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṁ, rūpāyatanameva cārammaṇaṁ, tathā itarāni itaresaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:11_7: Iti channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato dvādasa vuttānīti evamettha tāvatvato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:12_0: 514.Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
anya-e0102n3:12_1: Ajjhattikesu hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṁ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṁ desitaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:12_3: Atha vā dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyahetubhāvena bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṁ desitāni, tato ghānāyatanādīni tīṇi,
anya-e0102n3:12_5: cakkhāyatanādīnaṁ pana gocarattā tassa tassa antarantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni.
anya-e0102n3:12_7: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe… manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa’’nti (ma. ni. 3.421; saṁ. ni. 2.43).
anya-e0102n3:13_0: 515.Saṅkhepavitthārāti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṁ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
anya-e0102n3:13_1: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
anya-e0102n3:13_2: paccayagatinikāyapuggalabhedato pana anantappabhedaṁ. Tathā sotāyatanādīni cattāri.
anya-e0102n3:14_0: 516.Daṭṭhabbatoti ettha pana sabbāneva saṅkhatāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:14_1: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti,
anya-e0102n3:14_8: Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṁ evaṁ hoti ‘‘aho vata amhākaṁ sāmaggiyaṁ viññāṇaṁ nāma uppajjeyyā’’ti,
anya-e0102n3:14_9: na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṁ dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti, na byāpāramāpajjanti, atha kho dhammatāvesā,
anya-e0102n3:14_14: Bāhirāni gāmaghātakacorā viya, ajjhattikānaṁ abhighātakattā. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘cakkhu, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n3:14_16: Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni, bāhirāni tesaṁ gocarā viyāti.
anya-e0102n3:17_1: Tadanantarā pana dhātuyoti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, ghānaviññāṇadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu, dhammadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātūti. Tattha –
anya-e0102n3:20_0: Tattha atthatoti cakkhatīti cakkhu. Rūpayatīti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:20_1: Cakkhussa viññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇanti evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṁ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo. Avisesena pana vidahati, dhīyate, vidhānaṁ, vidhīyate etāya, ettha vā dhīyatīti dhātu.
anya-e0102n3:20_2: Lokiyā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṁ ,
anya-e0102n3:20_3: anekappakāraṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ vidahanti. Bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya, sattehi dhīyante, dhāriyantīti attho. Dukkhavidhānamattameva cesā, avasavattanato.
anya-e0102n3:20_4: Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi saṁsāradukkhaṁ sattehi anuvidhīyati.
anya-e0102n3:20_5: Tathāvihitañca taṁ etāsveva dhīyati, ṭhapiyatīti attho.
anya-e0102n3:20_6: Iti cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṁ vidahati,
anya-e0102n3:21_1: Apica yathā titthiyānaṁ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi, na evametā,
anya-e0102n3:21_2: etā pana attano sabhāvaṁ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
anya-e0102n3:21_3: Yathā loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo selāvayavā dhātuyoti vuccanti,
anya-e0102n3:21_6: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu dhātusamaññā,
anya-e0102n3:21_7: evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n3:21_10: Tathā hi bhagavā ‘‘cha dhāturo ayaṁ bhikkhu puriso’’tiādīsu (ma. ni.
anya-e0102n3:22_0: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṁ dhātu ca cakkhudhātu…pe… manoviññāṇañca taṁ dhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātūti.
anya-e0102n3:23_1: Tāni ca pana nesaṁ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:24_0: Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
anya-e0102n3:24_2: Cakkhudhātu rūpadhātūti idañhi dvayaṁ hetu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti phalaṁ. Evaṁ sabbattha.
anya-e0102n3:25_1: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – tesu tesu hi suttābhidhammappadesesu ‘‘ābhādhātu, subhadhātu, ākāsānañcāyatanadhātu, viññāṇañcāyatanadhātu, ākiñcaññāyatanadhātu, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:25_2: saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu’’ (saṁ. ni. 2.95), ‘‘kāmadhātu , byāpādadhātu, vihiṁsādhātu, nekkhammadhātu, abyāpādadhātu, avihiṁsādhātu’’ (vibha. 182; dī. ni. 3.305; ma. ni. 3.125), ‘‘sukhadhātu, dukkhadhātu, somanassadhātu, domanassadhātu, upekkhādhātu, avijjādhātu’’ (vibha. 180; ma. ni. 3.125), ‘‘ārambhadhātu, nikkamadhātu, parakkamadhātu’’ (saṁ. ni. 5.183), ‘‘hīnadhātu, majjhimadhātu, paṇītadhātu’’ (dī. ni. 3.305), ‘‘pathavīdhātu, āpodhātu, tejodhātu, vāyodhātu (dī. ni. 3.311), ākāsadhātu, viññāṇadhātu’’ (ma. ni. 3.125; vibha. 172), ‘‘saṅkhatadhātu, asaṅkhatadhātu’’ (ma. ni. 3.125),
anya-e0102n3:25_5: Evaṁ sati sabbāsaṁ vasena paricchedaṁ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo katoti ce.
anya-e0102n3:26_1: subhadhātu pana rūpādipaṭibaddhā. Kasmā, subhanimittattā. Subhanimittañhi subhadhātu.
anya-e0102n3:26_3: Kusalavipākārammaṇā vā rūpādayo eva subhadhātūti rūpādimattamevesā.
anya-e0102n3:27_2: Kāmapaṭisaṁyutto takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo’’ti (vibha. 182). Aṭṭhārasāpi vā dhātuyo.
anya-e0102n3:27_3: Yathāha – ‘‘heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṁ pariyantaṁ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṁ etasmiṁ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:29_4: lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo ca majjhimadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:31_3: Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṁ sabbadhātūnaṁ tadantogadhattā aṭṭhāraseva vuttāti.
anya-e0102n3:32_1: Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṁ saññāsamūhananatthampi aṭṭhāraseva vuttā.
anya-e0102n3:32_2: Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino,
anya-e0102n3:32_3: tesaṁ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātubhedena tassa anekataṁ cakkhurūpādipaccayāyattavuttitāya aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṁ jīvasaññaṁ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā.
anya-e0102n3:32_5: Ye ca imāya anatisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyasattā,
anya-e0102n3:38_0: 522.Saṅkhatoti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena,
anya-e0102n3:38_2: phoṭṭhabbadhātu pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:38_3: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena dve dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0102n3:38_5: Manodhātu pana pañcadvārāvajjanakusalākusalavipākasampaṭicchanavasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:38_6: Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṁ arūpakkhandhānaṁ soḷasannaṁ sukhumarūpānaṁ asaṅkhatāya ca dhātuyā vasena vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:38_7: Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena chasattati dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:39_0: 523.Paccayāti ettha ca cakkhudhātu tāva cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā vippayuttapurejātaatthiavigatanissayindriyapaccayānaṁ vasena chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n3:39_1: rūpadhātu purejātaatthiavigatārammaṇapaccayānaṁ vasena catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n3:39_3: Pañcannaṁ pana nesaṁ āvajjanamanodhātu anantarasamanantaranatthivigatānantarūpanissayavasena pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n3:39_8: Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana anantarāya javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā tehi ceva pañcahi āsevanapaccayena cāti chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Esa tāva pañcadvāre nayo.
anya-e0102n3:40_1: Āvajjanamanoviññāṇadhātu ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā purimehi pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n3:40_2: Dhammadhātu pana sattannampi viññāṇadhātūnaṁ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatādīhi bahudhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n3:40_3: Cakkhudhātuādayo pana ekaccā ca dhammadhātu ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapaccayādīhipi paccayā honti.
anya-e0102n3:40_4: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnañca na kevalaṁ cakkhurūpādayo paccayā honti, atha kho ālokādayopi. Tenāhu pubbācariyā –
anya-e0102n3:42_1: Vitthārato pana paccayappabhedo paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissatīti evamettha paccayatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:43_1: Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatadhātuyo pubbantāparantavivittato dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasuññato paccayāyattavuttito ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n3:44_0: Visesato panettha bheritalaṁ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā, daṇḍo viya rūpadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:44_2: Tathā ādāsatalaṁ viya cakkhudhātu, mukhaṁ viya rūpadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:44_7: Tathā adharāraṇī viya cakkhudhātu, uttarāraṇī viya rūpadhātu, aggi viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsu.
anya-e0102n3:45_0: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṁ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n3:46_0: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n3:46_2: puthujjanānaṁ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi viya.
anya-e0102n3:46_4: Saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṁ pakkhipanato aṅgārakāsuyaṁ khipanakapurisā viya.
anya-e0102n3:46_8: Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā?
